title: The Hidden Keeper
description: Love and loss define us all, but Juliette had experienced neither until the death of her Father, and the appearance of a beautiful stranger called Caleb. His arrival brings secrets; secrets which will threaten her family and those she loves. Forced to face a knew knowledge of the world she neither understands or feels part of, her 18 years of life will never be the same again.
author: Sharon  Davies
